moves.name: Teleport
moves.description: Use it to flee from any wild Pokémon. It can also warp to the last Pokémon Center visited.

moves.name: Kinesis
moves.description: The user distracts the target by bending a spoon. It lowers the target's accuracy.

moves.name: Confusion
moves.description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the target confused.

moves.name: Confusion
moves.description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the target confused.

moves.name: Disable
moves.description: For four turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used.

moves.name: Miracle Eye
moves.description: Enables a Dark-type target to be hit by Psychic-type attacks. It also enables an evasive target to be hit.

moves.name: Ally Switch
moves.description: The user teleports using a strange power and switches its place with one of its allies.

moves.name: Psybeam
moves.description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. It may also cause confusion.

moves.name: Reflect
moves.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from physical attacks for five turns.

moves.name: Telekinesis
moves.description: The user makes the target float with its psychic power. The target is easier to hit for three turns.

moves.name: Recover
moves.description: Restoring its own cells, the user restores its own HP by half of its max HP.

moves.name: Psycho Cut
moves.description: The user tears at the target with blades formed by psychic power. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Calm Mind
moves.description: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: Psychic
moves.description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. It may also reduce the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Future Sight
moves.description: Two turns after this move is used, a hunk of psychic energy attacks the target.

moves.name: Trick
moves.description: The user catches the target off guard and swaps its held item with its own.
